caption.title: IEQ virulence was attenuated when inoculated intracerebrally.
caption.p: A dose of 1 Ã— 10 5 PFU of each EV-A71 variant was administered intracerebrally into one-day old suckling mice. Clinical scores and percentage of survival over 13 days post-infection are shown. Significant differences between viral variants and WT are labelled as *** ( P < 0.001).
